When viewing the page I found out that Asus, is a failure that occurs when the load is damaged pink. I live in Venezuela and now for me it is very cumbersome to use the warranty. As would do to recover the gift of my child?

Reviews.Title: Great economic tablet.
Reviews.Author: Henry Lemasters
Reviews.Content: I'm an asus fanboy so its hard for asus to disappoint me. I only gave it 4 stars because there are some apps that wont run on it yet, but thats not really their fault.

Reviews.Title: Works well, good deal at a good price.
Reviews.Author: David Loomis
Reviews.Content: We have learned that by turning the brightness lower, the battery lasts longer and it is still bright.  Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Nice starter tablet
Reviews.Author: Paul Bennett
Reviews.Content: This tablet was a 1st for our 7-year old.  It keeps her happy, but for a power user, it falls short.Pros:  Asus quality, inexpensive, color choices, decent battery.Cons:  Slow to restart or start from the off status, Slower CPU means certain apps hang easily.Overall, this is a good starter tablet or as a power E-Reader.  Good for watching movies too.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Smithd20
Reviews.Content: stores all my movies, music, games, apps, and more!i use it to place library books on it for trips, and music for work, and it's amazazing!

Reviews.Title: GREAT!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Ginny Stack
Reviews.Content: This is a great little tablet. I bring it everywhere. The only thing I wish it had was a flash. The camera takes good pictures outside but inside you need decent lighting. Anyway overall it is great and the price is good. I've checked out others and thus by far beats them.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Kevin Schlirf
Reviews.Content: My child says that the tablet does exactly what it was bought for, allow him access to homework assignment and emails. He has never complained about anything concerning the tablet. I think it's time for me to get one.

Reviews.Title: resolution is not really clear and runs not smooth
Reviews.Author: Lam Shan Kwok
Reviews.Content: Resolution is totally no good at all and device itself runs not smooth...find a better deal on tigerdirect and bestbuy.

Reviews.Title: screen is bad
Reviews.Author: LI
Reviews.Content: When i watch video, the screen make me faint.The screen is not clear at all. The screen makes the video out of shape.

Reviews.Title: It does the job
Reviews.Author: Melody
Reviews.Content: I am a college student and needed a cheap and light tablet so I could follow along with the professors powerpoints. It's great for simple stuff like notes. I don't use it for games. It can hold a charge for a few days with occasional use. I like it, small, light, cute, and affordable!

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: This tablet is a good product for the price. It has intalled android sos. I think it met the expectations.

Reviews.Title: didnt work
Reviews.Author: Juan Zuluaga
Reviews.Content: i bought this tablet but its bricked. cannot update, the battery died. i contact the seller and help me with my issue but it feels upset abpout quality of this tablet

Reviews.Title: Great 1st Tablet
Reviews.Author: Vicky C. Galloway
Reviews.Content: I had been looking at tablets and e-readers for a long time. Getting ready to go on a trip I saw this on sale and decided to try it. I am new to apps. and widgets, (and lions, and tigers, and bears, oh my!) but have had no problem downloading and using apps on this tablet. Some apps, such as the Kindle app, open a bit slowly but work beautifully. The camera leaves a lot to be desired but that's not what I bought it for. I really like the notes app. I love the size. It just fits in a purse or tote while the larger ones don't. Display is nice also. I am thinking about buying one for my mother to introduce her to electronic toys.

Reviews.Title: I love my ASUS Tablet
Reviews.Author: John Robson
Reviews.Content: I rated this product five stars because it's everything I hoped it would be and more, I would recommend this product to anyone who wants more than just a reader tablet.

Reviews.Title: Cute little gadget
Reviews.Author: donnadonchev
Reviews.Content: This tablet is adorable. We have a bigger version of it, but this one is sooo cute. I got it for my mom, and it's easy to navigate and use

Reviews.Title: My child loves it!
Reviews.Author: cristy
Reviews.Content: We got this as a Christmas gift and haven't had any problems with it.  My Child pretty much just uses it to play games on at this point.

Reviews.Title: Great Value as a Starter Tablet
Reviews.Author: Steven Pawson
Reviews.Content: Bought one of these refurbished off of 1sale.com (sorry Amazon) and it is the first tablet I've ever bought, though I've used others at Best Buy, friends houses, and at college for various projects. I like simple reviews, so I've made this as concise as possible.Pros:- 1024X600 Display. While it isn't as fancy as the iPad or the Nexus, the display is more than enough for daily use. Can I discern the pixels? Yes, but any text bigger than 6pt font is clear and Netflix quality is more than acceptable.- Battery life. The MeMO Pad has 3 settings for battery; saver, balanced, and performance. To test its lifespan I played "The Dark Knight" from beginning to end at 75% brightness on balanced mode with headphones in. The movie is 2.5 hours long, and when it was over the battery was at 56%. This means you can watch about 6 hours of video before needing to recharge.- Processing speed. No problem playing "Plants vs. Zombies 2". 1 GB of RAM seems to do nicely for whatever apps I am using. There is a 1 second lag when rotating the screen, but no major problems.- Micro-SD slot. From my own research, this is noteworthy. While the 16 GB internal storage is great (that's about 7 standard definition movies, a few hundred pictures, plus a whole bunch of apps), if that isn't enough then you can triple your space with a 32 GB micro-SD card.- Full access to Google Play Store. Need I say more?- Runs on Android 4.1 OS. My last phone had the 2.3 version. After only a few minutes I could see the difference in performance. 4.1 is a lot faster, more user-friendly, and makes for a more enjoyable tablet experience.Cons:- No outward-facing camera. I don't expect or even want this to act as a digital camera, but I know this could be a deal-breaker for some people.- Touchscreen keyboard. I have fairly large hands being almost 7' tall, so I can't imagine how regular people feel using the sideways keyboard. Vertically, it isn't too bad, although the weight distribution feels off. Some of the keys are in odd places too, like the period and enter keys. Not the worst thing in the world but not as comfortable as preferred.- Speaker quality. This tablet is designed with headphones in mind. The EQ software does a good job but the single internal speaker isn't meant for anything more than system noises. It isn't terrible though, and given how cheap this tablet is, this is probably to be expected.- No Amazon Instant Video. I get that Adobe Flash player is no longer compatible with newer Android tablets, but come on! Half of the reason I love Amazon Prime is to watch Prime videos. Netflix and Vudu are compatible, but Prime has some titles unavailable on either.Final Verdict:I really like this tablet. High marks for battery life, display, and processing power. While the lack of an outward-facing camera and the quality of the speakers make it fall short of its more expensive competition, I would highly recommend it for anyone who wants a tablet for traveling or to use at work.

Reviews.Title: ASUS MeMO Pad ME172V
Reviews.Author: Ann-Marie Griffeth
Reviews.Content: I have all three colors on this tablet were purchased as a gift to my kids, I don't know if the pink one I got had a weak screen or some thing else but the other two have taken a beating form my 2 and 3  year old and nothing has happened to them. The pink one we have no idea what happened to it, our daughter set it down and when she picked it back up the screen was cracked. We have had it less than a month. I highly recommend if you buy these you spend the extra I think it was $14+/- for the extra Warranty.

Reviews.Title: WOrks great!
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: We were required to got a tablet for nursing school to practice documentation.  I ordered this one because of the price and so far it has held up nicely.  Does everything I need it to do and for half the price as some other tablet brands!

Reviews.Title: OK for little ones.
Reviews.Author: shopperV
Reviews.Content: This is diffenently not a tablet for adults or skilled adults. If you just want something to play a few games on or check your email... well ok. This is a entry level tablet.!

Reviews.Title: is very good
Reviews.Author: jose jimenez
Reviews.Content: I but for my friend and her said i like that.The color is good and the material is handover.

Reviews.Title: i like it
Reviews.Author: aimen fituri
Reviews.Content: i buy this MeMo pad for my little baby she is old 2.5 years and she is very happy with this MeMo pad also i can close the apps with password .

Reviews.Title: best buy ever!!!
Reviews.Author: JOYCE
Reviews.Content: this is a must have very easy to use and fits nice in your hand I have told a few people to get this tablet...

Reviews.Title: Tablet For my 13 year old.
Reviews.Author: Astoria Dones
Reviews.Content: My son was very happy with his gift. I bought him this tablet for his birthday. I love Amazon for many reasons but the main reason is variety. This is always my first stop when I'm looking for a gift.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Simon Liebman "Simon L"
Reviews.Content: This unit has good battery life and I have a few 16Gb MicroSD cards so the internal memory is not an issue.

Reviews.Title: Meh...
Reviews.Author: mijohnst
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son over Christmas.  For a kid it's great.  We both play Clash of Clans and you can really tell the CPU performance difference with my Galaxy 8.

Reviews.Title: Great budget tablet, Works as expected. Great for kids.
Reviews.Author: D. Fox
Reviews.Content: This is a great little tablet! I read many of the reviews before purchasing, and was a little hesitant; I have bought a few off brand tablets on price and been disappointed in their speed, and compatibility with many apps. This unit works great in comparisons to those. I only had one app with compatibility issue, and the speed is good for a budget tablet. I think some people are expecting high end tablet speeds and display quality from this unit. I was able to purchase my tablet for $90, for that cost it has performed better than any other budget tablet I have owned! I would have paid up to $130 for this type/quality of tablet. The Asus performed well with all the apps I testing on it. Only one had compatibility issues (media PlayerPro). The tablet does lag at times when running multiple apps, and requires a reboot every now and then. But I have come to expect this and even worse lags from all budget tablets, I highly recommend this one and it is worth the slight extra cost. Battery life is a little low, with constant use you will probably only get about 3-4 hours out of it, it will easily last a day with standard use.  I let my kids use this one, they are not as concerned with quality and speed, and can stay tethered to a computer or power outlet when playing for extended periods of time..

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Gabor Kovacs
Reviews.Content: Works, but it's slow. I would liked to have gotten something more expensive/better. You would be better off to get something a little more expensive.

Reviews.Title: its an awesome device in this price..
Reviews.Author: Dhaval Parikh
Reviews.Content: i have installed lot of apps in this but still working good... video quality is awesome.. i can play youtube videos in HD.facebook, hangout and skype is running perfect i just dont like camera qulity but in his price this device is awesome..... love it..

Reviews.Title: ITS A VERY NICE PRODUCT... IT CAME AS I SPECTED… I RECOMMENDED… QUALITY 95%... WE ARE USING IT WITH NO TROUBLE AT ALL 100% OK…
Reviews.Author: ñañon
Reviews.Content: ITS A VERY NICE PRODUCT... IT CAME AS I SPECTED… I RECOMMENDED… QUALITY 95%... WE ARE USING IT WITH NO TROUBLE AT ALL 100% OK…

Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: brandon landry
Reviews.Content: It works well only thing I don't like about is that, the camera is only front view. Other than that it works fine.

Reviews.Title: Overheating problem
Reviews.Author: danny chow
Reviews.Content: The battery tends to over heat easily after 30 minutes of candy crush game play multiple times.  It will crash and shut itself down.  After it cools down, it can be used again.  Other competitive models that I have (nexus 7, cheaper $50 to $100) do not have that problem.  The graphic is comparable with nexus but the overheating is an issue at least for the asus 7 that I have.  I ordered it in september 2013.  About 4 months ago.  Unfortunately, Amazon only has one month exchange policy.  Does the manufacturer has a exchange policy.

Reviews.Title: Better than my Kindle
Reviews.Author: dee cocca
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband. He loves it and the battery life is 4x my Kindle' s battery life. I will be buying another one for my daughter's birthday. Great tablet at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the money!
Reviews.Author: Nathan L. Reitz
Reviews.Content: For what it is (a cheap entry-level tablet), it's a fantastic deal.  I've used plenty of other cheaper tablets that were pure junk, and didn't even have enough processing power to run angry birds.  Not this tablet.  It is a solid contender, and has handled everything thrown at it (except the driveway).  Luckily I purchased a Square Trade warranty with it, so the drop was covered.  I was so impressed with this tablet, I bought another.

Reviews.Title: Cliche, but it IS a good tablet for the money.
Reviews.Author: Lysa
Reviews.Content: Bought one for my daughter for Christmas. She loves it. Easy to use, full Android features, fast set up. Her only grip is that the power button is positioned right where a corner strap for most tablet cases sits, so it turns off sometimes, but other than that, she loves everything about it.

Reviews.Title: Worked OK for what I needed it for
Reviews.Author: brookman101
Reviews.Content: I bought it so I could do my online schooling without having to be stuck at my computer desk all the time. It played almost all the games that I had downloaded from the Google play store except 1. the only complaint I have is the tablet wouldn't freeze but being with the smaller processor and ram is was really slow some times. But It worked perfect for what I needed it for I would recommend this tablet to others.

Reviews.Title: It was defective!
Reviews.Author: ladrenia
Reviews.Content: After receiving this product. I attempted to use it and it kept shutting off after fifteen minutes of use. I sent it back and got my money back. I did however love the look and how small it was. I was looking for a tablet that I could play a few games on, read, and easily fit into my purse. Also I did follow all the instructions for charging it up, but still no luck.

Reviews.Title: Asus MeMO Pad ME172V-A1-PK 7-inch 16 GB Tablet (Pink)
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: I like it but, do not like the short life time of the battery.  It seems I'm charging more than using it.  Also, disappointed there was not a manual for me to follow to fully load the programs I mostly use, and how to transfer all the info from my desktop PC.

Reviews.Title: Ship fast
Reviews.Author: Kenia rolon
Reviews.Content: Thank you and have a nice new year ,hope you have more sales ,have a nice day asus is a good brand

Reviews.Title: Tablet Case
Reviews.Author: Lisa Coleman
Reviews.Content: The pink cover fits perfect and she loves it because she can set up the holder part and not have to hold it.

Reviews.Title: Short battery life
Reviews.Author: R. Anderson
Reviews.Content: I got this for my 80 mom to look at pictures and she likes it but the battery rounds down so fast and she is does not live in a " remember to recharge world" and gets frustrated easily when it needs a re charge before use.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Eric Armstrong
Reviews.Content: We bought my ten year old daughter one of these for Christmas. My wife already had one and since we knew how great the product was and she wanted a tablet, we decided to go with another Asus. The price was a great value. My wife was a tad jealous that we were able to get my daughter a pink one. ;)I would recommend this tablet to anyone familiar and comfortable with android based operating systems. While I have not purchased an ASUS motherboard in awhile  (no recent computer upgrades), I have always been impressed with the over all quality of ASUS products.

Reviews.Title: Great Starter Tablet
Reviews.Author: Julie Waichulaitis
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my pre-teen daughter. While she really wanted a larger screen with a detachable keyboard style tablet; I wasn't willing to spend that much money not knowing if it would be taken care of.  This tablet is a great choice to bridge the gap. She loves it! Being Google based, she is able to use all of her apps that are on her phone (except Instagram), it is compatible with what her school is using.  While it doesn't have a back facing camera, it does have the front facing camera so she is able to Skype with family and friends. It is a very reasonable price for a great tablet. I would highly recommend this for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great Product ~ The 7 year old works it great here 9 year old sister has the same ~ great investment

Reviews.Title: Solid 7 inch tablet
Reviews.Author: Robert Koons "ROb"
Reviews.Content: Soiid 7 inch tablet.  For the money its delivers what is expected.  Tablet does lag sometimes so don't think that this will be blazing fast.  Purchased a quadcore 7 inch tablet from W Mart for same price that has no lag at all and is generally faster and better screen resolution but it is only a 8GB so in fairness I think the 2 equal out.  Although you can add memory to the 8gb tablet and there is not much you can do with the lag in this one.  Still satisfied with the purchase and wouldn't hesitate to recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: No problems with it.
Reviews.Author: Sherry 2013
Reviews.Content: It works really great! Easy to use.  My 10-year old uses it often. Great for the price! Highly recommended for all ages.

Reviews.Title: I like this product
Reviews.Author: Jose Figueroa
Reviews.Content: is a gift for my niece and she likes me much hope to continue buying products asus as they are good quality

Reviews.Title: Good for kids
Reviews.Author: The diva "That's me"
Reviews.Content: I have this tablet for my kids 3 and 5.  For them it is perfect.  I love the security features and the fact i can lock up anything on it.  it is a good little tablet - dropped many times and has cracked screen but still works.  if you are looking for something to do more than stream internet and watch online tv - this is not machine.  however if you are using for online tv and kids games - it works great.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price...
Reviews.Author: M. Rainey
Reviews.Content: Wow, an Asus Tablet for about $100.  Great price and functionality.  Only negatives no GPS or Bluetooth.  This is a good buy.

Reviews.Title: 3months and it has stopped working
Reviews.Author: marcus tardieu
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed with this product from this seller... I purchased the asus brand over the cheaper tablets because I know it should be a better quality but yet three months later and it is not taking any charge... Don't think the tablet I bought from this dealer was brand new as advertised... very dissatisfied and disappointed!

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: jimmy
Reviews.Content: great tablet I haven't had any problems and it is fast and everything it says great buy especially for the price

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet
Reviews.Author: Anne Thompson
Reviews.Content: Great little tablet. This was purchased as a gift for my 8 year old son. It's easy to use and works great!

Reviews.Title: Entry level.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: A great device.  No bluetooth though.  I would like to have seen a few more features.  Overall, it is a very dependable and handy tool to have.  I use it often and have found a few accessories help to make it more useful.

Reviews.Title: GOODDDDD
Reviews.Author: Juan Rios
Reviews.Content: dad loves it and its very usefull my dad wanted something so he surf the web without turning on the pc so booooooooom there you go

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Brady Ware "Brady Ware"
Reviews.Content: Love my tablet. However, it did randomly shut off and never turn back on without warning after about 4 months and I had to send it in to be repaired. The warranty allowed me to get a new one after I sent the old one in, I just had to pay to ship it out.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!?!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet apprehensively. I wasn't sure that it was going to be a decent tablet. The ratings were good and the reviews were pretty nice but I wasn't sure.But I'm so happy that I did buy this tablet, it not only is better then I thought but it actually has a battery that can last throughout my entire workday.Buy this product! You won't regret it!

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: jose antonio maria
Reviews.Content: Great tablet! The price is perfect. The android system work very faster in her. The only don't like so much is the power botton

Reviews.Title: realy a good product
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: excellent product and recived in excellent time if i ever need to replace will go to them first it is smoth and works like a charm.

Reviews.Title: think before buying
Reviews.Author: Nic
Reviews.Content: tablet worked great for 4 months and then speaker stop working other than that i loved it have no idea why the speaker stopped working

Reviews.Title: Great little device
Reviews.Author: sexy man
Reviews.Content: This item came quickly and in great shape. We are using it to keep track of inventory in our warehouse at work and it is flawless in syncing with the computer that we use to store the items. It is just the right size for quick and easy access.

Reviews.Title: Fun, Easy and Useful!
Reviews.Author: Ann T.
Reviews.Content: I haven't had any trouble with it - just started using it right away - and it's pretty intuitive if a great grandma can figure it out!

Reviews.Title: ASUS Tab decent value
Reviews.Author: Jersey Nole
Reviews.Content: Decent tablet for the price. Does everything I need it to, it can be a little sluggish though.  I would recommend this for someone who does not ask much of the tablet. It is perfect for my 8yr old daughter.

Reviews.Title: ASUS MeMo Pad ME172v-A1-WH 7-inch 16GB Tablet
Reviews.Author: Dr. C. Bradenton "dr. c"
Reviews.Content: I have no problem with the tablet per se, except as noted at the end of this review. My problems stem from the very poor documentation. I did finally succeed in getting the 100 page plus PDF file download after a lengthy search and , finally, assistance from a real person.  I think that whoever put that manual together assumed the user has considerable experience in using Android machines (phones, etc.).  Also, instructions in the use of the most common "apps" would be helpful. For example, I have not yet learned how to delete a Kindle book if I start it and want to get rid of it. Also, I have free Hulu on my computer but from the AUSUS all I am able to access is Hulu Plus. Finally, the built in speaker is a bit weak and the jack for ear buds does not work. A problem not worth the hassle of a return!

Reviews.Title: memo 7 Asus tablet
Reviews.Author: Patricia C.
Reviews.Content: My 7 in memo tablet is awesome. Its all little small for the eyesBut it is quicker speeds and downloads are great.

Reviews.Title: Dissatisfied
Reviews.Author: Mary L. Lange-Snyder
Reviews.Content: difficult to use, battery doesn't stay charged long enough, things I have bought or tried to preview doesn't download, thiking about returning it and getting something different

Reviews.Title: Best price available!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "yummymummy"
Reviews.Content: Had a bit of an issue with accessing wireless and contacted the manufacturer.  They walked me through a factory reset and a few more steps that seemed to resolve the issue.  Otherwise, this has been a solid buy for the value and made a 10 yr. old birthday girl very happy.  Great deal on Amazon.com!

Reviews.Title: Well priced, able tablet
Reviews.Author: Allan
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my father. A good, solid basic, somewhat slow tablet. Screen is better than decent, uses Jelly Bean and can do most of the stuff that tablets do. If you want a no frills, very reasonable priced tablet, go for it.

Reviews.Title: Battery died quickly, and the rest soon after.
Reviews.Author: Dimitri
Reviews.Content: A little bit slow, and does not have great resolution. Died after about 3 month of use. Battery stopped holding charge after less than a month, and one day tablet started making weird noises while being turned off. Speakers made sound that resembled static (pretty loud too), while tablet was turned off. While it was making that loud sound, it was impossible to turn on the tablet, or do anything else to stop it.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for kids
Reviews.Author: armando lopez valencia
Reviews.Content: Brought for my daughter is the perfect children tablet (with the proper case) if you consider cost/benefit, netflix plays without problems.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed with this ASUS product
Reviews.Author: Rhade70
Reviews.Content: The Android OS, the size and speed of the tablet were all amazing. However, I discovered that many other people have had problems with the tablet shutting off and indicating that the battery was low even after hours charging.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality, Portable, Good Battery life.
Reviews.Author: Karen Lakey
Reviews.Content: This is light weight yet sturdy. It does not have bluetooth but the micro usb folio keyboard I purchased is a perfect accessory for this device. I have played 2 full length movies on this and still had charge left on it. The wifi connects easily to various vendors. I took it with me on the plane for a day trip with a 3 hour leg each way played some simple games one direction and a full movie on the return leg and had plenty of charge left.  Even with the folio keyboard it is easy to carry in my larger purse. Apps load very quickly. My initial test of the quality of sound for music was not too impressive, but I did not fiddle with any controls to try to adjust it either. I'm not a gamer so I cannot evaluate that aspect, but for my intended use this device is about half what I expected to pay. I am very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: nati
Reviews.Content: i was disappointed from the the camera. i was accepting to find the camera in the back not in the front

Reviews.Title: Nice budget tablet I got here for 89.00
Reviews.Author: Trismegistus "Trismegistus"
Reviews.Content: Nice tablet on par with Galaxy Tab, like it so much I am buying another, going to try the HD MEMO PAD this time, very similarly priced right now (check it out).My daughter's tablet, she uses it a lot and it seems to hold up nicely. Holds a charge with moderate use about 8 hours, screen is almost as responsive as the IPADS and Tab2, resolution is the same as the Tab 2, and it comes with 18 GB storage rather than 8 as does the Samsung. Not quite as fast or responsive as the Galaxy Tabs, but more solid connector cables and less bloatware. It's not an IPAD, or even a TAB2, but for the price it is a GREAT tablet. Thanks again, Amazon.

Reviews.Title: All you need at a great price
Reviews.Author: dharris9311
Reviews.Content: Great for social networking, email. Can't beat the price (89.00 - when I purchased)I bought these for my GK's (Early,pre-teens) and they absolutely love them!

Reviews.Title: Plug-in
Reviews.Author: Debra Duhon
Reviews.Content: The plug in charger does not work, lucky I had another plug-in charger from another device that works.Thank you

Reviews.Title: The best tablet low price
Reviews.Author: Jailton Leite Silva
Reviews.Content: I love Asus products. They have incredible quality for a honest price. Image is sharp, sound is good, processor and ram is enough for most games and applications. I recomend.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price!
Reviews.Author: James Galka
Reviews.Content: Got two of these (for my 4 and 6 year old girls).  Originally got the Coby equivalent which I returned for these. This is twice the product for a marginal price increase. Screen is much better, and more responsive. Processing speed is better, and this brand has access to the google play store that the Coby does not. Great buy for the price!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: faisal
Reviews.Content: Excellent, low price, and specifications are acceptable, 16 GB internal memory , 1 GB RAM , Good for small games

Reviews.Title: Great for Tweens
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: My ten year old daughter saved her money up to get a tablet and this was perfect for her. It is easy to use, lets her play games, listen to music, take pictures - everything she wanted to do. It is a simple, basic tablet but perfect for a tween.

Reviews.Title: Awesome deal
Reviews.Author: David G
Reviews.Content: I've owned the 250 dollar asus Nexus 7 with 32 gigs.  But this one is almost as good with 15 gigs and 150 shaved off the price.  I was disappointed that Viber and Tango weren't compatible.  But the rest of my favorite applications are there.  I use Google voice, Skype, and Talkatone instead which work the same.  The only complaint I had was the microphone is very faint.  I looked at the docs and located the pin sized mike at the top and tested the input by speaking directly into it and my wife says that the volume is much better and she can hear me ok now.  It's fast enough, even if my phone appears to be quicker.  Unbeatable deal for a 7 inch tablet.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: pdiaz
Reviews.Content: For the price is good.. Bought it for my 6 yrs old son .. He like playing with it.. Wish it was a little bigger

Reviews.Title: Is really a Good Tablet
Reviews.Author: nerak18
Reviews.Content: Is good for the price, is so fast, and pretty. The only thing is that doesnt have bluetooth, but is nice

Reviews.Title: cheap model
Reviews.Author: Raul Wuity
Reviews.Content: I would not buy this again just got it and its already freezing and crashing its not worth 100 dollars more lik 50

Reviews.Title: Good! (But not perfect.)
Reviews.Author: JN
Reviews.Content: This was a great price for a 7" tablet with these specs, however, I noticed the battery dies entirely too fast and the screen resolution can be slow on large apps.

Reviews.Title: Good buy..
Reviews.Author: lisa
Reviews.Content: I bought two for my kids and they love them. Although, I had to return one of them, because it wouldn't turn on properly. Now with the new one we received it works perfect..over all a good buy for the price...

Reviews.Title: Great price for a child's first tablet.
Reviews.Author: Elaine Bosch
Reviews.Content: My middle schooler bought it with his own money and is using it for school.  So far, he is liking it.  The touch screen is not as sensitive as my IPAD which he likes a lot more.  He is very happy with his purchase.

Reviews.Title: Decent Product
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: I ordered this item for my 8 years old niece. She loved it.I would say it is a decent product int his price range, din;t like the image resolution much. A backside camera would have been great +, however it has only front facing camera.Apps runs at avg speed, and comes with good no of preloaded apps.I would recommend this product to kids not for adults and grown ups they may find it cheap.

Reviews.Title: Very good value
Reviews.Author: Tony Familia
Reviews.Content: It's not as good as an iPad, but it costs about a quarter as much!  This is for my 8 yr old and 6 yr old.  I chose the ASUS MeMo because it was the cheapest, brand name, tablet pc.  I am actually very impressed.  Kids love it.

Reviews.Title: Happy Granddaughter
Reviews.Author: Roger W. Kinsman
Reviews.Content: I bought this MeMO Pad for my Granddaughter of 11 yrs and she was so happy it was worth every penny.  So far it has performed fantastically and I am very please with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Luzia Teruya
Reviews.Content: I recommend for all.  It's good choice.  Easy to use. My kid love it! It's a good price and product.

Reviews.Title: Love the Tablet
Reviews.Author: Kathy Cretsinger
Reviews.Content: I wanted this to have something small to download documents and go. It is wonderful. It's everything I wanted and more. The price was right and I'm enjoying it everyday.

Reviews.Title: Low Price GreaTablett
Reviews.Author: Bammbamm69
Reviews.Content: For a middle user (not a kid not an expert), this Tablet is great. The screen is clear and the touch and multitouch Works very fast. One of the aspects I like more, is that with almost 100$ was posible to buy a very good Tablet, with 1GB RAM and 16GB storage capabillity. I think that this Tablet will be great for an student how needs a Tablets.

Reviews.Title: perfect tablet on perfect price range
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It ie really good quality tablet on best price range.Easy to use and kids just love it!!!!Will buy another one soon..

Reviews.Title: Great for my uses, which are basic
Reviews.Author: Synthesis
Reviews.Content: With the HD 7 out (which is a far superior choice) last year's model can be yours for quite a bit cheaper.I managed to snag mine from Office Depot for 80 (bought the 2 year warranty since I knew going in that the tablet wasn't amazing) and because of that, I'd say my expectations were honestly a little broken. I was expecting to pull it out of the box and having NOTHING work properly, and although there were honestly a few issues, I'm quite okay with my purchase.I wanted a 7 inch tablet mostly for reading manga and watching anime on. I haven't tried watching anime on it, but the manga is very crisp and gorgeous. A lot better than reading on a computer or a tiny smart phone. It's portability also allows it to replace a laptop for some students, myself included, which has been quite pleasant so far.PROs:- Pretty cheap, 80~100 dollars for a 7 inch tablet? Not bad- Has a bit of weight to it, makes it feel durable- 16GB of onboard storage with a microSD slot, sweet!- The screen looks gorgeous to me at least, my manga looks crisp and very readableCONs:- The screen is terribly glossy. I can't STAND it. It's also pretty uncomfortable to swipe your fingers along it. It doesn't feel smooth at all.- My model came with the time setting being glitchy. Not a huge deal since you can always manually set it.- I can't copy/paste?- The manga app "Mango" doesn't work very well. :/- It can be quite laggy at times, but that's to be expected- I can't for the life of me figure out how to get a wallpaper that isn't blurry.- Some of the stock apps (which can't be removed :s) are seriously annoying.READ: I noticed some people complained about some Google Play apps not working. All of my apps that I had on my smartphone work just fine, but I backed them up with ES File Manager and transferred the .apk files to the tablet and installed them that way. Try that if you can't get something from the Market to install. Of course, this will only be viable if you own a different Android product.

Reviews.Title: SMH
Reviews.Author: TK
Reviews.Content: Its cheap for a reason. Charger did not work out of the box. Within two day we started noticing lagging issues. Touch keybord is less than mediocre. I regret buying this for a birthday present. Im sorry to say, I thought ASUS would've made better product considering their history in manufacturing motherboards that receives excellent reviews. This was a sloppy attempt at the tablet market... look else where

Reviews.Title: More than I expected
Reviews.Author: Miguel Serrano
Reviews.Content: This tablet is a gift to my daughter, but I am using it for a while. It does more than I expected, I would recommend this product for parents with 12 - 13 year old children to use it.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Lisa F
Reviews.Content: I've never owned a tablet before; don't even have a smart phone.  Asus is a brand that was recommended by someone that has several Asus products.  The price was perfect and I have not had a single problem in the 2 months I've had it.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Safi
Reviews.Content: I really like it so far.I especially use it to read my articles whenever I want and need which is very convenient when you spend time commuting.

Reviews.Title: not what I expected.
Reviews.Author: alan w
Reviews.Content: I find the start/stop method poor. The hidden button is small, badly placed and sometimes difficult to push.I cannot attach a keyboard or a mouse as there is no true USB port.It occasionally jumps back to prior programs without noticeI have had other laptops like this and they were better.I have used this Asus for several months hoping to get accustomed to it's quirks... and still am not happy.

Reviews.Title: grea tansaction
Reviews.Author: binky495
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and great speed,the high def svreen is really beautiful,Love all tje aps to pickfromwould buy again too

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: RickM
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 6 year old grand-daughter and she was quite happy with it,I had my son check out the system and he said it was very good for the price I paid for it went to say it was better than the kindle,this is an excellent product you can't go wrong with it,has more features than the i-pad

Reviews.Title: good battery life
Reviews.Author: Tasha Daley
Reviews.Content: good battery life. the tablet works well but the microphone is not good. i returned it and got a galaxy 3 8.0 instead. hope this works better.

Reviews.Title: Okay Tab
Reviews.Author: Michael C.
Reviews.Content: A great tablet for the price. We bought this for my 6 year old son who wouldn't leave our Android phones alone. It runs every app/game we try, but sometimes it gets bogged down and the textures stop rendering on the games. This is always because my sone doesn't close anything after he is done with it. use a "task killer" app and you will love it. Video quality is good for a $120 tab.

Reviews.Title: It does everything I expected -- and more. It's a great value for the price.
Reviews.Author: Kathryn Huss
Reviews.Content: This is my first ePad. Each day I am discovering new things that it will do. I love the Kindle Reader, YouTube, email, and To Do Pad features, as well as the ease of downloading Apps and music. Overall, it's an excellent investment.The only problem I have had is that I have a slight tremor, which makes it difficult to use the virtual keyboard. That's definitely NOT a problem of the MeMO Pad -- and it's getting easier as I figure out exactly how I need to place my finger. I have been thinking that a stylus might help.

Reviews.Title: Love this
Reviews.Author: A Mom
Reviews.Content: Pretty little tablet, works great, very sturdy. My daughter is able to take it to school and use it, print out and basically have a small laptop with her. Great little item.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: yensil lara
Reviews.Content: The product is of good quality. Very practical and the operating sistems runs very well. The tablet has many app. 100% recommend!!!

Reviews.Title: Asus Memo Tablet
Reviews.Author: Cat
Reviews.Content: Very, very pleased with the Asus Memo tablet. Easy to set up and use. I would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Simms
Reviews.Content: I have looked around for the perfect tablet for myself.  I like to read and venture out in other areas.  This table does it all. Thanks awesome

Reviews.Title: Fine work
Reviews.Author: vra7455
Reviews.Content: It works fine . Do its job . My child use it to play and do classes homeworks. I recomendit

Reviews.Title: ASUS Memo Pad
Reviews.Author: Lori A Jackson
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an inexpensive tablet just for the basic needs of organizing my life a little and holding a few apps that I like. I wasn't looking forward to spending a big price tag as I really depend on my laptop for all my college courses and everyday use. I am extremely impressed with this little tablet. For $99 it delivers more than your money's worth. I know what it can and can't do and it has more than I need. If you are looking for dual cameras that is the only thing that this does not have that the more expensive ones do. However, with the access to dual cameras on just about every device out there, I am fully satisfied with this having one camera. If you need two ASUS has a wide range of tablets/laptops and are competitively priced. Quality has been top notch on the ASUS laptop that I have had for over a year now and I believe this device will give the same quality. I am looking forward to purchasing these for some teens in my life for Christmas because at this price you can't go wrong and it is much cheaper than a "smart phone".  The only reason I give this 4/5 is the lack of the second camera.

Reviews.Title: Not that great
Reviews.Author: Jamo Forst
Reviews.Content: This tablet came highly rated by fiends and family. I was very disappointed in it when it arrived. I had issues powering it on after a full charge. Once it was powered on, it seemed to lack the power and speed I had expected.  It also randomly will not go to home screen after I unlock it.

Reviews.Title: Worst that google tab
Reviews.Author: Fahad
Reviews.Content: I bought this assuming it would be the same as the google tab as the specs and manufacturer are the same, but seems like not. My wife is complaining about the fluidity on the screen and the key pad is not user friendly at all. won't recommend

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Aaron Alves
Reviews.Content: Works perfect for the usage that I need and seems to hold charge for a while as well great buy

Reviews.Title: Asus
Reviews.Author: Rikki Boodram
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd product from Asus. I have never dealt with asus before and I am loving this new tablet I got! I opened it and read the manual to start. You have to charge this for 8 hours before you turn it on (even though when I plugged mines in it turned on for the setup.) I don't use Google much but hey its a good web browser. I also ordered a screen protector and a case for this. Now I'm fiddling with it and experimenting with it. Overall I Like the speed, style and simply the looks of it. After all, this is my first tablet and it was good for the price. Now when the order came, the back was not grey but it was a dark navy blue. Which I'm perfectly fine with. But I'd wish the color I chose for the order would have came to me the same color. Shipping was on time. I'm looking forward to doing business with Asus soon.

Reviews.Title: Decent for the price
Reviews.Author: Troy Stafford
Reviews.Content: Performance is good. Nor t lightning quick or buttery smooth but very capable. The build is solid and the micro SD slot comes in handy. Viewing angles are so so but for straight on media consumption you could do alot worse. Speakers are surprisingly loud for a tablet albeit a bit tinny which is to be expected. Battery life is ok with moderate mixed use. I bought the device for my daughter and she enjoys it.

Reviews.Title: good tablet
Reviews.Author: NKLT
Reviews.Content: From the same makers of the famous NEXUS 7 google tablet, asus gives us a tablet that has the perfect balance between quality, price-performance, this tablet has a spotless building materials and quality that only this great Taiwanese manufacturer can give us ,

Reviews.Title: Good value for the money.
Reviews.Author: David R. Russell
Reviews.Content: It is a christmas present so it is still wrapped in the plastic.  But it seems like a very light & nice tablet for the money.  It has good features and expandable memory.

Reviews.Title: There are better tablet at this price
Reviews.Author: Vikas
Reviews.Content: For $100 it is not bad product but there are other products with less known brand which are better.Display is good but every other thing in this tablet is slow.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Jennelle Blackman
Reviews.Content: Great product at a great price. Good enough for your basic needs on the Internet. I would certainly recommend it to anyone

Reviews.Title: You get how much you paid for.
Reviews.Author: Vlad Cekus
Reviews.Content: Works fine, a bit slow thou. This is only in comparison to faster Nexus 7HD that we purchased at the same time.

Reviews.Title: The best 7" pad !!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Just what I wanted!! It responds quickly to every request. I'm totally pleased with my Asus Memo pad! Shipping was amazing- next day!! I'm happy!

Reviews.Title: Amazing price/convenience
Reviews.Author: Rafael Miranda
Reviews.Content: Amazing Tablet. The relation price/convenience is total. Of course, it doesn't have all features as a big tablet but, I guess is the best deal for the price.

Reviews.Title: A little disappointed :/
Reviews.Author: SaabGuy85
Reviews.Content: This tablet is a little sluggish in performance but otherwise it's a decent/cheap tablet. I would say if you're only willing to spend a hundred dollars, then buy this, otherwise spend a little more and get a Nexus 7.

Reviews.Title: its Ight
Reviews.Author: shawn murphy
Reviews.Content: decent processor can be slow at timescamera isn't the best but not terriblescreen is responsive most of the timeits your basic tablet spend the extra $20 for the quad core

Reviews.Title: ASUS MeMO Pad ME172V-A1-GR7.0 iNCH 16 GB Tablet.
Reviews.Author: Linus Mizutani
Reviews.Content: I love it,  my grand kids are using it now. the product and the program that are installed in asus memo pad172v-a1-gr 7.- inch are pretty good. hope you install the dictionary in every procducts.thanks

Reviews.Title: I like It

Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter and she loves it. The only draw back I saw is the speed. Comparing to Google nexus it is bit slow. any way worth for the price...

Reviews.Title: like it
Reviews.Author: Carl F. Cartini
Reviews.Content: exceeded expectations and 14 year old special need child is very happy, and so is her dad--i consider it a "best kept secret"

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Iza Camacho Fidalgo
Reviews.Content: Excellent, fun and incredible game.Right on time and high quality service.I don't have more words to describe my satisfaction

Reviews.Title: love it!!!!!
Reviews.Author: leonardo arias
Reviews.Content: exelent buy!!! even bought some for my nephew so he can stop messing with my phone and my brothe'great resent for the kids

Reviews.Title: Great product for such a low price
Reviews.Author: Dean jonas
Reviews.Content: The item arrived on time after I purchased it. I simply turned it on and entered my google account information . It has worked as stated without a flaw. It is quick and responsive. I love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: Try this item its nice and cute:) but a little bit heavy. Much better if the tablet has a camera at the back

Reviews.Title: Lots of bang for the buck!
Reviews.Author: Richard Z.
Reviews.Content: This is not a high end tablet, but it has a lot of bang for the buck. I got it for a great price, it certainly does everything I had hoped for and more. I have a PC, I have a laptop, I just wanted a tablet that I could check my email with, pop onto facebook from time to time, establish a calender etc. I does all that I need, is very user friendly and you can't beat the price.Very satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Fits my needs perfectly
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tablet mainly for reading, email, social media, etc. and it fits those needs perfectly.  Set up was quick and easy. Have watched a few youtube videos and was pleasantly surprised with the picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Jeremy McNeal
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my mother for her birthday. The size is perfect and there haven't been any issues with it; I was concerned that it would be really slow because of the price; and that the touch input wouldn't be sensitive enough; but everything was great. It's fluid and the interaction feels every bit as good as an iPad. The screen is bright. The product exceeded my humble expectations; I will probably buy another one for myself.

Reviews.Title: :D
Reviews.Author: Rydia
Reviews.Content: It's great. it's the proper shade of pink. I freakin love it. And it holds ALL MY PORN AND vidya gaems.what more can a girl ask for?

Reviews.Title: It was good but

Reviews.Content: HIThe item was very good but I did a mistake.I thought It has rear camera.I may purchase another one from AMAZON but I have to sure of getting the right one.Thank you

Reviews.Title: Why I bought it?
Reviews.Author: jan senk
Reviews.Content: I really haven't need a tablet before, and I just wanted to try, how it works. But now I like it, it's good substitute instead of laptop.

Reviews.Title: Could not beat the price
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: Got this little pad on clearance for less than 100 bucks. Good quality, good price. Not the fastest one out there but not the slowest either. Glad I got it.

Reviews.Title: Spend the extra money and get a galaxy tab 2
Reviews.Author: zmonster8u
Reviews.Content: I like the tablet, but I find a few apps I use on my iphone or ones that I would like to try are not compatible.  As far as tablets, it is a starter.  I was trying to save a few bucks and see it is even $20 cheaper than I paid in a month.  It would be great for a kid, but not an adult.  I use it to play candy crush and watch movies.

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: Jordan Serson "Serson Person"
Reviews.Content: I got this for my girlfriend and she's had no complaints. It's like getting a Nexus 7 for half the price. For a first tablet user, it's a great experience. Thanks Asus and Amazon.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Billy
Reviews.Content: I bought the tablet for my wife and she loves it. It was definitely worth the price. Would recommend for purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good for the kids
Reviews.Author: caliqro
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet to replace my 6 yr old's Asus Nexus Tablet. We downloaded Netflix and it has worked fine for us. We also downloaded several other games and have had no problem with glitches or non-compatibility. Youtube and web browsing work fine too. My only complain is the camera, it is front facing and it is difficult to take pictures of stuff. Honestly, I was drawn to it for the price and I'm happy with it overall.

Reviews.Title: Every one should choose the ASUS ME172v-A1-PK 7-inch 16GB Tablet
Reviews.Author: Sherwin G Williams
Reviews.Content: The Asus memo pad is really worth the price and for 16gbs you can't go wrong, this tablet is smooth and really quick, the one thing i dislike is that, it has no bluetooth.

Reviews.Title: Great, although there is a click during some audio output.
Reviews.Author: J. Maier
Reviews.Content: I love this machine.  Two people who have seen it have ordered their own.  One of them sent back a 10inch of another brand to get this one.  My only complaint is a a click when I stream certain radio stations.  I don't think it's a defect since the sound is fine during video games and voice recordings.

Reviews.Title: Decent tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: The tablet is not lightning fast but fast enough.One great feature is that it allows you to utilize the entire formatted 12.8GB of storage which some tablets won't let you do this they set a predetermined size of memory for apps and the other storage what ever that may be is for music so overall it's a pretty decent tablet i recommend this tablet for first time and intermediate users this tablet should serve well for adults or kids.

Reviews.Title: It's better than I thought
Reviews.Author: Lhipol
Reviews.Content: 100% recommended. It's a excellent product. Nice design, good resolution, very good memory and time of response.  really like it!!!

Reviews.Title: Bought it for daughter
Reviews.Author: David S. Lincoln
Reviews.Content: This is perfect for my daughter.  The size is great and the performance for the games she likes is great.

Reviews.Title: Super, but could be a little better
Reviews.Author: jnovoa
Reviews.Content: I cannot go for the 5 stars just because of a couple of reasons: 1- it does not have a back camera 2- just one speaker, not stereo.For the rest the tablet is great.Al last an affordable tablet with good performance and responsiveness!!!I definitely recommend it.I recommended it to a friend, she liked mine, and I got her the 10"

Reviews.Title: First tablet
Reviews.Author: Scott Degraffenreid
Reviews.Content: I mainly use this as an alternate e-reader to my basic Kindle and for checking e-mail, a little web-surfing. I didn't want to spend too much since I was skeptical as to how much I'd use it vs my smart phone and laptop. Overall it has been a pleasant surprise. The tutorial was sub par but Android is pretty intuitive. Quality and features seem comparable to my boss' I-pad for 1/4 the price. I'm satisfied but will probably upgrade in a year or two as new features come online for less $.

Reviews.Title: Great  price, great product
Reviews.Author: Brent
Reviews.Content: Bought this recently and its not a bad tablet at all even thou it lack GPS and bluetoothASUS MeMO Pad ME172V-A1-GR 7.0-Inch 16 GB Tablet ( Grey ).And it's a brand name too.Great  price, great product

Reviews.Title: Just received today!! Works Excellent!!!!
Reviews.Author: jen
Reviews.Content: Its perfect!!!! Works flawlessly!! Love it!!! Well worth the money!! Very pleased!!! Excellent product!! Perfect for my daughter she loves it!

Reviews.Title: good product for the $$
Reviews.Author: M. Andrewjeski
Reviews.Content: ASUS has pushed the market to lower their prices on good, entry level tablets.Bought for my daughter.  Really suits her needs well.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy. I hope I am wrong
Reviews.Author: Satish Kumar
Reviews.Content: Ordered the ASUS 7" tablet for its attractive price. Amazon fulfilled it very quickly. When I received the unit, I turned it on. The unit said it had a system update to download. Downloaded the update and the clicked on the button to start the installation. The tablet would not start after this step. I waited for 30 minutes and started charging. The unit got so hot that I couldn't hold it on my hands anymore. I did a hard reset and it still wouldn't start. At this time, I just hope that I received a defective unit. I also own a Google Nexus 7" which is made by ASUS and I thought I could buy something directly from ASUS with confidence. However, this experience has reduced my confidence on buying another ASUS product again. Therefore, I am back to shopping for a new tablet.

Reviews.Title: Like the product and my son loves it
Reviews.Author: davekalyn
Reviews.Content: My son loves his tablet. It does everything that he needs and more. The negative and its a pretty big negative to me was the seller. We bought this item for our son for Xmas. As you can guess we bought it before Xmas time and had it hidden away from prying eyes. Shortly after Xmas the tablet was acting up. We called the seller to see about swapping it for a working one. We were told a very short, "its over thirty days". Repeatedly got told that and only after Amazon stepped in did they do something. By the time that happened we had had it repaired. Again a great tablet, horrible seller. My apologies but the seller was Electronic Express. Big 0 out of 5 on them.

Reviews.Title: Garbage! Should have listened to the negative reviews. Save yourself the time and money. Purchase something else!
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Junk! Constantly freezing! Speakers sound like something from the 99 cents store. I will never purchase another Asus product again. Screen has horrible viewing angles. Do yourself a favor and get a samsung galaxy tab 2.7.0 or note 8.0.

Reviews.Title: Defective product - intermittent touch
Reviews.Author: Ace
Reviews.Content: Was sent a defective product, touch was intermittent to not working at all.  This should be checked prior to sending to customer, very poor outgoing quality control. Returned it 1 day after I received it.

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: Doris Ward
Reviews.Content: I like it for small things but really dissappointed in the way it takes pictures.  You can't see what you are taking a picture of, no eye hole in the back of it.

Reviews.Title: Asus 7 inch Notebook
Reviews.Author: Janice
Reviews.Content: I don't like the fact that the screen goes into a 3d effect if you look at it from the side.  My friend has a Samsung and you can view the screen from any direction and it looks good.  I have ordered a Samsung,

Reviews.Title: Excelent Tablet
Reviews.Author: RicardoSoto
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet, it has everything you want is in here for a great price. An excelent tablet for daly uses,

Reviews.Title: Bad luck, it freezes, since i got it.

Reviews.Content: I bough this tablet as a start for my kid and it has been freezing, in fact they just abandoned using it. I have factoy reset it a couple times and it still bad, no additional programs downloaded to make sure there's no virus.I will try getting a replace,

Reviews.Title: Very Good!!!
